title: Attention Incorporated Network for Sharing Low-rank, Image and K-space Information during MR Image Reconstruction to Achieve Single Breath-hold Cardiac Cine …
details: S Xu, K Hammernik, A Lingg, J Kuebler, P Krumm… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Cardiac Cine Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) provides an accurate assessment of heart morphology and function in clinical practice. However, MRI requires long acquisition times, with recent deep learning-based methods showing great promise …
